name: Point Connect 4
description:
Point Connect 4 is an arcade puzzle game with points, dots and their connectors.

THE GAME'S GOAL:
This game's goal is to connect all the dots of equal color while using up all given platforms. It may not be as easy as it sounds - some levels are bigger than other ones and the trick is to calculate the line in such way that it crosses each platform point. As the levels go further, they become harder and get bigger panels to start with.

Bigger boards mean bigger challenge! Good luck, connect them all!
